text:
@RandPaul @realDonaldTrump Get well soon R. Paul.

That said:

Moronic and selfish @RandPaul knew he may have coronavirus for days yet didn’t self isolate.

He exposed Senators (most are seniors). He was even in the Senate cafeteria and working out in the Senate gym yesterday!

Selfish. Stupid. Trump-like.
